title: Xi Jinping and Putin Discuss BRICS Cooperation With Brazil’s President
description: Chinese President Xi Jinping and Russian President Vladimir Putin engaged in phone conversations with Brazilian President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva regarding their joint work within the BRICS group ahead of the economic bloc’s leaders’ summit. Lula has been a vocal advocate of ditching the U.S. dollar in favor of national currencies and a proposed […]
